org.rapla.mobile.android.app

Class RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dialog
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.app.RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog

  • public class RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog
extends Dialog
    The dialog allows for selecting a category (either the root category or one of its child categories) by displaying a list view with check boxes. Clicking a category drills down into its sub-categories whereas a click on the icon in the dialog title bar navigates one level up.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.IconAscendOnClickListener
      This listener class listens to clicks on the icon in the title bar and thereby allows for navigating to the upper category.
      static class  RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListener
      This listener class listens to clicks on rapla category names and allows for drilling down on the clicked category.
      static class  RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog.RaplaCategoryOnClickListenerFactory
      Factory class for RaplaCategoryOnClickListener to ease injection into the list view logic.
